metadata.dc:author: Martínez Vidal, J
García Sarandeses, A
López Amado, M
metadata.dc:description: The biopsy of minor salivary glands has great value in the diagnosis of the pathology of salivary glands; however, this technique is little known and seldom used. During the last 18 months we have studied in order to describe the technique and its utility.
metadata.dc:title: Biopsia de glándulas salivales menores: indicaciones y técnica de realización.
[Biopsy of minor salivary glands: indication and implementation].
